1.name: Centre
1.desc: The associated text is centred in the available space.

2.name: Left
2.desc: The associated text item is aligned flush left in the available space.

3.name: Right
3.desc: The associated text is aligned flush right in the available space.

4.name: Justified
4.desc: The associated text is justified in the available space.

5.name: Preceded by one blank line
5.desc: The text is to be preceded by one blank line.

6.name: Preceded by two blank lines
6.desc: The text is to be preceded by two blank lines.

7.name: Preceded by three blank lines
7.desc: The text is to be preceded by three blank lines.

8.name: Continuation
8.desc: The text is a continuation of preceding text.

9.name: New page
9.desc: The text is to begin on a new page.

10.name: End text
10.desc: The text is the final section of the preceding text.

11.name: New line
11.desc: The text is to begin a new line.
